name: Eduardo de Brito Colombo
body:
### Who I am?
I am a consultant, web developer, and software engineer currently living in State of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. My interests range from technology to web development. I am also interested in programming, education, and entrepreneurship.

I'm a looking for a new experiences as Senior PHP Developer.

### Experiences
Time and experience as owner since 2005 and researcher since 2002 in the most exciting areas of technology gives me the opportunity to see and to improve my abilities further.
I am able to easily learn new languages ​​and frameworks, having a solid knowledge of concepts such as SOLID, KISS, STUPID, DSL, UML.
I have right to European citizenship.

I had an important position in the construction of Eduline, an e-learning platform at FACCAT University on the development was leader and Senior PHP Developer. 
I know a lot about e-learning, PHP frameworks and Linux-based infrastructure.

I have developed online systems management area, based on the ACL.
I like working with automation, internet of things, pervasive environments. I participated in the development of a fuel station automation system. I have developed a Java print server for thermal printers ARGOX.
I have built an application with integration with photographic cameras of CANON automation and printing in amusement park.


### About.me
[about.me](http://about.me/eduardobcolombo)
